ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ismid.p | |- P = ( Base ` G ) |

| 5 |  | ismid.1 | |- ( ph -> G TarskiGDim>= 2 ) |

| 7 |  | midcl.2 | |- ( ph -> B e. P ) |
| 8 |  | midcgr.1 | |- ( ph -> ( A ( midG ` G ) B ) = C ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( pInvG ` G ) = ( pInvG ` G ) |
| 10 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 | #P_midcl | |- ( ph -> ( A ( midG ` G ) B ) e. P ) |
| 11 | 8, 10 | #P_eqeltrrd | |- ( ph -> C e. P ) |
| 12 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 9, 11 | #P_ismidb | |- ( ph -> ( B = ( ( ( pInvG ` G ) ` C ) ` A ) <-> ( A ( midG ` G ) B ) = C ) ) |
| 13 | 8, 12 | #P_mpbird | |- ( ph -> B = ( ( ( pInvG ` G ) ` C ) ` A ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ph -> ( C .- B ) = ( C .- ( ( ( pInvG ` G ) ` C ) ` A ) ) ) |
| 15 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( LineG ` G ) = ( LineG ` G ) |
| 16 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( ( pInvG ` G ) ` C ) = ( ( pInvG ` G ) ` C ) |
| 17 | 1, 2, 3, 15, 9, 4, 11, 16, 6 | #P_mircgr | |- ( ph -> ( C .- ( ( ( pInvG ` G ) ` C ) ` A ) ) = ( C .- A ) ) |
| 18 | 14, 17 | #P_eqtr2d | |- ( ph -> ( C .- A ) = ( C .- B ) ) |
